My WordPress Web Design Service
Barcelona

WordPress Freelancing Service

With Barcelonas WordPress Webdesign Service, I am offering a complete Service for your WordPress page which includes transferring your old page to a fresh & new WordPress installation, Fixing WordPress Errors, Debugging your Code, Adapt WordPress to your needs (Displaying an Instagram Feed after your blog post for example), coding and designing a User Interface and of course - helping you to find and to manage all the Plugins out there.

WordPress is one of the most famous Content Management Systems out there. It is open-source and it has an unbelievable community. WordPress is widely used from Barcelona to the whole world. Very famous pages like for example Walt Disney are using WordPress as their CMS.

WordPress Webdesign

One of the best things WordPress does is, you don’t need to set up a meeting with your web designer to change content or to add functions. With it’s easy to manage graphical user interface, you can add tons of functions that otherwise would be impossible to add, if you aren’t familiar with Web Development.

Common WordPress Issues

If you are for example experiencing one of the following, I can help you with my Barcelona WordPress Service:

  • Image Uploading Issues in WordPress
  • Facebook integration errors.
  • Internal Server Error.
  • 404 Pages for your Blog-Posts.
  • WordPress not sending Emails.
  • Too many Redirects.
  • “Upload: failed to write file to disk”
  • backup problems
  • WordPress Uploading problems.

Sometimes WordPress can cause you some sleepless nights, however there is nothing that can’t be fixed with WordPress.

Lukasz Adam
